name: XcERD
description:
So, this is the demo of a new game I'm currently working on for 4 months now.

In this short period I tried to implement many things for this game (some worked very well, and others didn't.)

(This demo is dated  for 12/24/2018, It was uploaded here and wasn't changed ever since that time.)

I hope you enjoy playing it as much as I enjoyed making it during the period of development.

Until then, Stay tuned for the full release of the game.

-SeireiART-
